thread.section_title: NWAonline stories: High School Sports - Northwest Arkansas
thread.title: 6A-SOUTH

title: 6A-SOUTH
text:
Posted: October 17, 2015 at 2:04 a.m. 
LITTLE ROCK PARKVIEW 31, SHERIDAN 22 
SHERIDAN — Junior quarterback Koilan Jackson threw two touchdown passes and ran for two more scores to lead Little Rock Parkview (5-2, 2-2 6A-South) over Sheridan (3-4, 1-3). Jackson finished 12 of 18 for 224 yards. He also rushed 17 times for 30 yards. 
The Yellowjackets struck first when Dustin Reed thew a 26-yard touchdown pass to Eli Anderson with 6:25 left in the first quarter. Reed completed 9 passes in 14 attempts for 122 yards. 
The Patriots responded with 2:39 left in the quarter when Jackson threw his first touchdown pass, a 39-yarder to Kolby McNeal. 
Sheridan retook the lead with 7:10 left in the half on Brockton Brown’s 60-yard touchdown run. Brown finished the game with 197 yards on 27 carries. Parkview scored two more times before halftime, thanks to Jackson. 
He threw a 74-yard touchdown pass to McNeal with 5:43 left in the second quarter to narrow the deficit to 15-14. Jackson ran in from 2 yards for his first rushing touchdown with 52 seconds left in the quarter. 
Ronaldo Gomez’s point-after gave the Patriots a 21-15 lead at halftime. 
The Yellowjackets reclaimed the lead at 22-21 with 11:43 left in the third quarter when Brady Bigg recovered a Parkview fumble and returned it 19 yards for a touchdown. 
The Patriots responded when Jackson ran 6 yards. Gomez’s kick gave Parkview 28-22 lead. Gomez provided the final margin when he kicked a 36-yard field goal with 7:05 left in the fourth quarter. 
LAKE HAMILTON 31, 
EL DORADO 22 
PEARCY — Johnathan Buss carried 25 times for 131 yards and 2 touchdowns as Lake Hamilton (2-5, 2-2) defeated El Dorado (4-3, 2-2) in a 6A-South game at Wolf Stadium. 
Buss scored on runs of 8 and 2 yards for Lake Hamilton, which overcame an early 10-0 deficit. Eli Jackson added 62 yards and 1 touchdown on 12 carries. Kawon Love had 18 carries for 131 yards and 2 touchdowns. 
(Advertisement)
